name: rubot
description: Strict multi-agent orchestration governor with 20 workflow commands, 8 hooks, 16 specialist subagents, and 18 domain skills for full-stack TanStack Start development
longDescription:
Rubot enforces deterministic, mandatory multi-agent consultation for all significant tasks in complex Claude Code projects. It acts as a project manager ensuring no decision is made without consensus from all relevant domain experts.

Features:
- 16 specialist subagents covering backend, frontend, database, deployment, testing, SEO, and more
- 20 workflow commands including 7 SEO commands (audit, check-schema, check-og, check-vitals, generate-robots, generate-sitemap, generate-favicons)
- 8 lifecycle hooks including 3 SEO hooks (meta-check, image-check, build-check)
- 18 domain-specific skills including 5 SEO skills (seo-audit, schema-markup, core-web-vitals, social-sharing, crawl-config)
- Frontend ownership model with shadcn-ui-designer as team lead
- Mandatory registry enforcement for 20 shadcn-compatible registries
- Chrome DevTools MCP integration for live SEO auditing
